argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrf2.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mvrf2.v | |- V = ( I mVar R ) |
| 3 |  | mvrf2.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 4 |  | mvrf2.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | mvrf2.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 2, 7, 4, 5 | #P_mvrf | |- ( ph -> V : I --> ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( V : I --> ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) -> V Fn I ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> V Fn I ) |
| 11 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> I e. W ) |
| 12 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> x e. I ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 11, 12, 13 | #P_mvrcl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( V ` x ) e. B ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I ( V ` x ) e. B ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( V : I --> B <-> ( V Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( V ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 15, 16 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> V : I --> B ) |
